Minor in Psychology: Minor in Psychology The Department offers an 18 s.h. minor in Psychology. The program is designed for students desiring a substantial background in Psychology while majoring in another field. The minor is designed to allow students the flexibility to choose courses that will further their career goals. Minors may transfer a maximum of 6 s.h. in Psychology courses from other institutions.
Electives:: Electives: Two 300/400 level Psychology courses 6 s.h. Three Psychology courses of any level 9 s.h.

notes: Total Required Credits for the Program: 18 s.h. Psychology Department Robinson Hall 856.256.4870 psychadvising@rowan.edu
